com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.endpoints

Interface CommentOperations

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalendarOperations, FileLibraryOperations, ForumOperations, JournalOperations, MessagingOperations, QnaForumOperations, ReviewOperations, TranslationOperations

    @ProviderType
public interface CommentOperations
    CRUD Operation of a Comment.

        OperationException - if there is an error occurs

      • move

        Resource move(SlingHttpServletRequest request,
              Session session)
       throws OperationException
        Perform a move operation. Required parameters from the request are: 1. "resourcePath" - the path pointing to the resource being moved 2. "parentPath" - the path pointing to the new target parent resource
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the resource after the move
        Throws:
        OperationException - OperationException
